title: Manipur Violence: Prime Minister Condemns Brutal Assault, Supreme Court Calls it "Gross Constitutional Failure"
content:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi has expressed his outrage over the horrific video of two Kuki women being paraded naked in Manipur, calling it a "shame for the entire country". He has urged all state chief ministers to prioritize law and order and ensure the safety of women. 

The Supreme Court has also taken suo motu cognizance of the incident, terming it a "gross constitutional failure" and demanding immediate action from the Centre and state government. The court has summoned the Attorney General and Solicitor General to discuss the matter.

The incident, which occurred on May 4th, has sparked nationwide outrage and calls for justice. The Manipur Police have arrested the alleged mastermind of the assault, but the opposition is demanding the resignation of the state's Chief Minister. The case will be heard again in the Supreme Court on July 28th.
